notes.text: For GenericTile, we've now updated the badge element name to Tileinfo, and also created a new enum TileInfoColor that adds color to the TileInfo element
sap.m.Input: Exception prevented in case of tabular suggestions
sap.m.Dialog: The toolbar spacer is no longer hidden on phone
We now support snapToRow property that sets the height of the inner controls to 100%
We've now introduced the badge element that is used within the GenericTile control as a combination of an icon and a text
sap.m.Input: Available items announcement improved
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
sap.m.Input: Prevent suggestions popover closing on Enter key
sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
GenericTile: Remove the critical color on the text when the tile is in ActionMode
sap.m.MaskInput: remove too descriptive label
sap.m.MessageBox: Add new dependentOn option
sap.m.IconTabBar: Badge is visible on tab with text and icon - inline mode
sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Prevent infinite resize
sap.m.Toolbar: Title font-size fixed
sap.m.Toolbar: Fix left aligment in Tables
sap.m.Slider: Accessibility samples adjusments
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is displayed correctly in Form
sap.m.Avatar: Fix image loading of Avatar
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix footer buttons visibility when there is not enough space
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix closing Popover with ComboBox
sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
sap.m.TimePickerClock: fixed time selection when the page is scrolled
We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
sap.m.MultiInput: Do not delete tokens on RIGHT arrow navigation
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix popup rendering
